name: Run Rage
description:
10 seconds to find a weapon.

10 seconds to kill enemies.

Repeat.

Your mind is splitted: One part of yours is a parkour runner who cannot use weapons. The second part is a trained killer. Your mind switches between them every 10 seconds.

As a runner you have to dodge enemy's bullets and find weapons.

As a killer you have to kill enemies in bullet time.

There is no proper ending :)

Controls:

WASD/Left Stick - Move

Mouse/Right Stick - Aim

LMB/Right Trigger - Fire

E/Left Face Button - Pick Up Gun

Left Shift/Press Left Stick - Sprint

Space/Bottom Face Button - Jump

Ctrl/Righ Face Button - Toggle Crouch

Esc/Menu Button - Quit
